template.title: Template
template.definition: Select a template for your flyer
template.question: Select a template for your flyer

tips.title: Choose a template for your flyer
tips.description: We have provided popular templates for you to pick the design for your flyer.

tips.title: Select a cover photo
tips.description: Your cover photo will displayed prominently in your flyer as a large image.

tips.title: Select thumbnails
tips.description: You can choose one or more thumbnail photos to be visible on your flyer.

tips.title: Edit highlights
tips.description: Enter the property highlights that will appear on your flyer. You can choose to edit the default highlights provided or replace it with your own descriptions.

tips.title: Confirm disclosures
tips.description: You can choose to disclose / hide / edit the price, address, realtor and brokerage firm information that will appear in your flyer.
